title: Integrate update-completions.sh into tool-update
description:
update-completions.sh exists but is never called automatically. Shell completions can get stale after tool updates. Should be:
- Called as part of tool-update after Ansible runs
- Or added as a post-update hook in the playbook
- Could also add more completions (fzf, atuin, just, lazygit, gh)

title: Make ssh-1p-toggle cross-platform
description:
ssh-1p-toggle only handles macOS paths but tools.zsh shows 1Password is configured for Linux too. Should:
- Detect OS and use appropriate socket path
- Handle Linux path: ~/.1password/agent.socket
- Source common.sh for CURRENT_OS detection

title: Make task function path configurable
description:
The task() function in functions.zsh has a hardcoded path to Obsidian tasks:
TASK_PATH="$HOME/Obsidian/Personal/Tasks/inbox.md"

Should be configurable via environment variable or XDG config.

title: Standardize script headers and error handling
description:
Scripts have inconsistent styles:
- git-repo-checker uses '#!/bin/bash' and 'set -e' instead of '#!/usr/bin/env bash' and 'set -euo pipefail'
- Some scripts source common.sh, most don't
- Color codes are defined differently across scripts
Standard should be: env bash shebang, strict mode, and use common.sh for shared utilities

title: Enhance check-env with comprehensive validation
description:
check-env currently only validates 6 commands and .zshrc syntax. Could be enhanced to check:
- Config files exist (starship.toml, mise config, etc.)
- PATH is properly configured (user bins at front)
- SSH agent is working (1Password integration)
- Git config is valid and user info is set
- Required environment variables are set
- Shell completions are up to date

title: Add more tool completions to update-completions.sh
description:
Current completions are limited to: rustup, deno, uv, mise, docker, wezterm
Could add: fzf, atuin, just, lazygit, gh, starship, bat, eza, fd, rg

title: Update bin/README.md with accurate documentation
description:
bin/README.md has several issues:
- Documents tc as 'Terminal color testing' but it's actually a tmux session creator
- Missing rproj documentation (the main unified remote project tool)
- Doesn't mention that rtmux/rcode are thin wrappers that delegate to rproj
- Missing docs for grab-yt-audio, grab-yt-video, md2pdf
close_reason: Updated README with accurate tc description, added rproj docs, documented rtmux/rcode as wrappers, added grab-yt-*, md2pdf docs

title: Adopt lib/common.sh utilities in bin scripts
description:
lib/common.sh has useful functions (has_command, run_step, print_section) but most scripts don't use them. For example:
- check-env manually uses 'command -v' instead of has_command
- git-repo-checker defines its own color codes
- bootstrap and tool-update duplicate section header logic

Refactoring to use common.sh would improve consistency and reduce duplication.

title: Evaluate removing rtmux/rcode backward-compat wrappers
description:
rtmux and rcode are thin wrappers that just delegate to 'rproj tmux' and 'rproj code'. They were added 'for backward compatibility' during the rproj unification.

If enough time has passed and there are no external references to these commands, they could potentially be removed to reduce maintenance burden. Should verify no Alfred workflows, aliases, or external scripts depend on them.
